First verify if this request is expected: ʻUluaki fakapapauʻi pe ʻoku fie maʻu mo tonu ʻa e kole ko ʻení pea kapau ʻokú ke fakapapauʻi, kātaki ʻo lomiʻi ʻi he URL ke hoko atu ʻa e totongí.
